subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Denver Nuggets guard J. R. Smith was suspended for the first three games of the regular season “for conduct detrimental to the team.” The Nuggets’ player personnel director, Mark Warkentien, declined yesterday to specify what Smith had done.
